mapper.sql: u.id AS u_id, u.service AS u_service, u.service_user_id AS u_service_user_id, u.name AS u_name, u.profile_img AS u_profile_img, u.recommend_code AS u_recommend_code, u.status AS u_status, u.reg_dttm AS u_reg_dttm, u.up_dttm AS u_up_dttm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER (service, service_user_id, `name`, profile_img, recommend_code, status, reg_dttm, up_dttm) VALUE (#{service}, #{serviceUserId}, #{name}, #{profileImg}, #{recommendCode}, 'MEMBER', NOW(), NOW());
